branding.tagline: Get insight into the areas of Google Workspace adoption, collaboration and security

WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_PROJECT_ID.label: GCP Project Name
WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_PROJECT_ID.description: This is the GCP project name where the Workspace service log have been exported to.

WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_DATASET_NAME.label: Reporting Dataset Name
WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_DATASET_NAME.description: This is the GCP dataset name within the project where the Workspace service log have been exported to.

WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_PRIMARY_DOMAIN.label: Primary Domain
WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_PRIMARY_DOMAIN.description: This is the primary domain for your Workspace organization. This can be found on the Workspace admin console (https://admin.google.com/ac/domains/manage).

WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_SECONDARY_DOMAINS.label: List of Secondary Domains
WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS_SECONDARY_DOMAINS.description: This is a comma separated list of secondary domains for your Workspace organization. This can be found on the Workspace admin console (https://admin.google.com/ac/domains/manage).
